summary: REQ-5 cannot be fully verified as implemented from the provided diff snippet; key required UI labels/visibility behavior for the final "Get Some Codes" action and the three revealed code buttons are not evidenced in the visible portion of the changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: After the user answers "Yes" to both questionnaire questions, show a final action button labeled exactly "Get Some Codes" (English text).
missing_requirements.reason: In the visible App.tsx snippet, the only primary CTA shown is labeled "Get Codes!" and the diff content is truncated before any section that might render the required "Get Some Codes" button; therefore the required exact label/visibility condition cannot be confirmed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Clicking the final action reveals exactly three buttons with the exact labels: "Sub2AcerXDucky = 4500 Money", "FunTrollTower6 = 3000 Money", and "ILoveTT6 = 1200 Money"; these code buttons are not shown before clicking "Get Some Codes".
missing_requirements.reason: The App.tsx diff is truncated before any code-reveal UI; while state like `showCodes`/`handleRevealCodes` exists, the rendered three buttons and their exact visible text (and the fact they are hidden until click) are not shown in the provided snippet, so the acceptance criteria cannot be verified from evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/used decorative iconography (Sparkles/Trophy/Gift) and additional themed header/landing-page embellishments not specified by REQ-5.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-5 only asks for gating and specific button labels/behavior; the diff shows new icon imports and use in the UI, which is extra beyond the stated requirement.
